short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ChatGPT experience with easy-to-use keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Terminal like behavior inside ChatGPT/Perplexity and more coming...

Shortcuts:

‚≠ê CTRL + ArrowUp: previous prompts. Continue press to cycle through earlier prompts.
‚≠ê CTRL + ArrowDown: recent prompts. Continue press to cycle through your prompt history. If prompt box is empty, it starts cycling from the first prompt.
‚≠ê More to come...

Please refresh ChatGPT/Perplexity tab after installing the extension.

Changelog:

‚úÖ Added automatic functionality to expand the textarea to the ChatGPT maximum default (200px) when the text is too long. (v0.2)
üîß Fixed bug where user couldn't send unchanged prompt. (v0.3)
‚úÖ Added support for Perplexity AI (www.perplexity.ai). (v0.3)
üîß Fixed support for Perplexity AI after UI change. (v0.3.1)
üîß Fixed bug in ChatGPT where user could not cycle through recent prompts by pressing CTRL + ArrowDown. (v0.3.2)
üîß Fixed support for Perplexity AI after UI change. (v0.3.3)
üîß Fixed support for Perplexity AI after UI change. (v0.3.4)
üîß Fixed support for ChatGPT after UI change. (v0.3.5)
üîß Fixed support for ChatGPT after change. (v0.3.6)
